    right="Feat 5"

>
[Empyreal Blessing](/Feats.aspx?ID=1356) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 36 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can call forth a benediction upon your allies, whether you pray to a deity of the celestial realms or just find the power within yourself. You can cast [_bless_](/Spells.aspx?ID=25) once per day as a 1st-level divine innate spell.
name: Empyreal Blessing
